fullText:
Fearsome Flurry [Foulborn Bloodline]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Foulborn Heritage, monk, Flurry of Blows class feature
Benefit: When you use your Flurry of Blows power, you can forego the normal effect to have the target take a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 142.
name: Fearsome Flurry
